::Zardus/DeathStorm::

Zardus stands up as the Alliance base reports Hell Beast and Megatron near 
the entrance.

He walks to the entrance, his face and torso still charred from the battle. 
Walking outside, he sees DeathStorm sneaking up behind the predacons, gun 
aimed at Hell Beast's head.

A quick shot from Zardus sends DeathStorm smashing into a tree and going 
unconscious.

Zardus looks back to the predacons. "Welcome," he says calmly, "Would you 
prefer to talk out here or in the base?"
